WorkItem.Description:
In the attached file my moonkin is wearing shoulders and legs from T13 set obtained through raid finder - both with itemlevel 384.
 
The buff "Deep Earth Regalia 2 pice bonus" is grayed out and not checked.
 
As soon as I replace Deep Earth Shoulderwraps (ilevel 384, id 78839) with Deep Earth Shoulderwraps (ilevel 397, id 77022) this buffed is ticked on.
WorkItem.Summary: Moonkin T13 shoulder (384) not counting towards set bonus

Comments.Message:
When trying to edit the 384 shoulders the field "Set name" is empty.
Refreshing the item from wowhead does not help, entering "Deep Earth Regalia" manually is the only way to make the shoulders count towards the set bonus

Are you sure you have the latest download and/or item cache. If you haven't tried already, try going to

Options -> Reset Item Cache.

If not I'm uploading an item cache that does have it set up for the next release.
